CodeEditorModel.Text:
'IAG Code behind - Add local subroutines for the IAG. Sub Metric ValueOutput = Value End Sub
Sub US
If UnitMetric = "°C" And UnitUS = "°F" Then ValueOutput = Value * 1.8 + 32 ElseIf UnitMetric = "mm" And UnitUS = "inch" Or UnitMetric = "mm" And UnitUS = Microsoft.VisualBasic.Chr(34) Then ValueOutput = Value * 0.03937 ElseIf UnitMetric = "bar" And UnitUS = "psi" Then ValueOutput = Value * 14.5038 ElseIf UnitMetric = "mbar" And UnitUS = "inch" Or UnitMetric = "mbar" And UnitUS = Microsoft.VisualBasic.Chr(34) Then ValueOutput = Value * 0.409 Else ValueOutput = Value End If
End Sub
Sub Refresh
Value = ValueInput If UnitChoice Then Call US Else Call Metric End If
End Sub
